reviews.subject: Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and makes complex topics easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Professor Doe has a deep understanding of the subject but sometimes goes too fast.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is enthusiastic and makes the classes very engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow, and the exams are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Professor Lee is a great instructor with a lot of real-world experience.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are informative, but the course materials are outdated.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor presents complex theories in a very accessible manner and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Anderson is passionate about art and provides great insights into historical contexts.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable and provides helpful feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Professor Thomas explains the material well but tends to focus too much on theory.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Harris encourages critical thinking and creates a stimulating class environment.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Professor Clark's classes are often disorganized, and the grading is inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis makes math interesting and provides plenty of practice problems.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Professor Young has a great passion for literature and provides excellent reading materials.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is very thorough in her explanations and provides helpful real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Allen covers the basics well but the class could benefit from more interactive discussions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is highly engaging and passionate about environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Professor Lee is very talented and provides a lot of practical insights into music theory.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Dr. Green's course is useful but the lectures could be more dynamic and less repetitive.

reviews.subject: Theatre
reviews.review: Professor White is very creative and provides great feedback on performances.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Adams makes linguistics fascinating and is always willing to help students with their research.
